definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: in [[סֶלַע הָרִמּוֹן]] cliff of R. Ju Jdg 20:45, Jdg 20:47, [[רִמּוֹן]] ´[[ס]]: v:Jdg 20:47, Jdg 21:13; Remmwn; = mod. cliff Rammôn, E. from Bethel, Buhl:G 100, cf. GFM:Ju Jdg 20:45.
in S. Judah, ´[[עַיִן וְר]]: Jos 15:32; ´[[עַיִן ר]]: Jos 19:7 (both P), 1Ch 4:32; = ´[[ר]]: Zec 14:10; Remmwn[q], etc.; v. III. [[עַיִן]]
in Zebulun Jos 19:13 (Remmwna(m)), = [[רִמּוֹנוֹ]] 1Ch 6:62 (Remmwn); +Jos 21:35 (rd. [[רִמּׂנׇה]] for [[דִּמְנׇה]] Di Benn Steuern); mod. Rummâne, c. 6 miles E. of N. from Nazareth (Buhl:G 221).
